1.0.name: wordpress/shopp-mediaburst
1.0.description:
This plugin integrates Shopp with Mediaburst.

This plugin adds text message notifications for new orders.

After checkout, the merchant will receive a text message with new order information.

This process occurs in the background without needing action from the customer.

NOTICE: Mediaburst has renamed their SMS Gateway to Clockwork. Learn more about the Clockwork API

Recommendations

  • Need help with your Shopp ecommerce store? Hire a Shopp consultant today.
  • View additional WordPress plugins for Shopp by Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC
  • Follow Lorenzo on Facebook,
